snippet: The bill, which bans abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, resembles one that the House passed last month and which was stalled by an 11-hour filibuster by State Senator Wendy Davis.
abstract: Texas House of Representatives passes vigorously contested bill restricting access to abortion.
lead_paragraph: The bill, which bans abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, resembles one that the House passed last month and which was stalled by an 11-hour filibuster by State Senator Wendy Davis.

headline.main: Texas House Passes Measure Tightening Clinic Rules and Restricting Access to Abortion
headline.print_headline: Texas House Passes Measure Tightening Clinic Rules and Restricting Access to Abortion
